title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: The focus caret is not in the first Combo.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo labeled as 'Host:'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application. 
2. Locate the first Combo labeled as 'Host:'. 
3. Click on the Combo.
